sources.src/js/views/recipeView.js:
import View from './View.js'; import icons from '../../img/icons.svg'; // import icons from 'url:../img/icons.svg'; //version 2 class RecipeView extends View { _parentElement = document.querySelector('.recipe'); _errorMessage = 'We could not fetch recipe data at this moment. Please try again later!'; _message = ''; addHandlerRender(handler) { //TODO: Listen for hashchange window.addEventListener('hashchange', handler); //TODO: Listen for load window.addEventListener('load', handler); } _generateMarkup() { return `
${ this._data.cookingTime } minutes
${ this._data.servings } servings

Recipe ingredients

    ${this._data.ingredients .map(ing => { return `
  • ${ing.quantity}
    ${ing.unit} ${ing.description}
    • `; }) .join('')}

How to cook it

This recipe was carefully designed and tested by ${ this._data.publisher }. Please check out directions at their website.

Directions
`; } } export default new RecipeView();
